00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 
00030 namespace L4 {
00031 
00035 template< typename T, typename SMART >
00036 class Smart_cap : public Cap_base, private SMART
00037 {
00038 public:
00039 
00040   SMART const &smart() const { return *this; }
00041 
00042   void _delete()
00043   {
00044     SMART::free(const_cast<Smart_cap<T,SMART>&>(*this));
00045   }
00046 
00047   Cap<T> release() const
00048   {
00049     l4_cap_idx_t r = cap();
00050     SMART::invalidate(const_cast<Smart_cap<T,SMART>&>(*this));
00051 
00052     return Cap<T>(r);
00053   }
00054 
00055   Smart_cap() : Cap_base(Invalid) {}
00056 
00066   template< typename O >
00067   Smart_cap(Cap<O> const &p) throw() : Cap_base(p.cap())
00068   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00069 
00070   template< typename O >
00071   Smart_cap(Cap<O> const &p, SMART const &smart) throw()
00072   : Cap_base(p.cap()), SMART(smart)
00073   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00074 
00075   template< typename O >
00076   Smart_cap(Smart_cap<O, SMART> const &o) throw()
00077   : Cap_base(SMART::copy(o)), SMART(o.smart())
00078   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00079 
00080   Smart_cap(Smart_cap const &o) throw()
00081   : Cap_base(SMART::copy(o)), SMART(o.smart())
00082   { }
00083 
00084   template< typename O >
00085   Smart_cap(typename Cap<O>::Cap_type cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap)
00086   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00087 
00088   void operator = (typename Cap<T>::Cap_type cap) throw()
00089   {
00090     _delete();
00091     _c = cap;
00092   }
00093 
00094   template< typename O >
00095   void operator = (Smart_cap<O, SMART> const &o) throw()
00096   {
00097     _delete();
00098     _c = this->SMART::copy(o).cap();
00099     this->SMART::operator = (o.smart());
00100     // return *this;
00101   }
00102 
00103   Smart_cap const &operator = (Smart_cap const &o) throw()
00104   {
00105     if (&o == this)
00106       return *this;
00107 
00108     _delete();
00109     _c = this->SMART::copy(o).cap();
00110     this->SMART::operator = (o.smart());
00111     return *this;
00112   }
00113 
00117   Cap<T> operator -> () const throw() { return Cap<T>(_c); }
00118 
00119   Cap<T> get() const throw() { return Cap<T>(_c); }
00120 
00121   ~Smart_cap() { _delete(); }
00122 };
00123 
00124 template< typename T >
00125 class Weak_cap : public Cap_base
00126 {
00127 public:
00128   Weak_cap() : Cap_base(Invalid) {}
00129 
00130   template< typename O >
00131   Weak_cap(typename Cap<O>::Cap_type t) : Cap_base(t)
00132   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00133 
00134   template< typename O, typename S >
00135   Weak_cap(Smart_cap<O, S> const &c) : Cap_base(c.cap())
00136   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00137 
00138   Weak_cap(Weak_cap const &o) : Cap_base(o) {}
00139 
00140   template< typename O >
00141   Weak_cap(Weak_cap<O> const &o) : Cap_base(o)
00142   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00143 
00144 };
00145 
00146 namespace Cap_traits {
00147   template< typename T1, typename T2 >
00148   struct Type { enum { Equal = false }; };
00149 
00150   template< typename T1 >
00151   struct Type<T1,T1> { enum { Equal = true }; };
00152 };
00153 
00157 template< typename T, typename F, typename SMART >
00158 inline
00159 Smart_cap<T, SMART> cap_cast(Smart_cap<F, SMART> const &c) throw()
00160 {
00161   (void)static_cast<T const *>(reinterpret_cast<F const *>(100));
00162   return Smart_cap<T, SMART>(Cap<T>(SMART::copy(c).cap()));
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00169 template< typename T, typename F, typename SMART >
00170 inline
00171 Smart_cap<T, SMART> cap_reinterpret_cast(Smart_cap<F, SMART> const &c) throw()
00172 {
00173   return Smart_cap<T, SMART>(Cap<T>(SMART::copy(c).cap()));
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 }
